data.name: Cross of Auria - Battle Series X
data.detailed_description:
Battle Series X is Cross of Auria's second free content DLC with challenges in the level 20-30 range.

This content pack includes:
• Access to the Zodiac Overwatch from a rift in the Veil. This location features exclusive enemies in random battles as well as farmable gear sets from the local bosses.

Minimum in-game requirements:
• Ruby must be able to access the Veil at will from anywhere in the world.

Updates[\b]:
• Development of this package is ongoing. Be sure to read new community updates to see anything has changed!
• This location receives updates in locked raid wing style up until the final boss is released.

data.short_description: The Battle Series X content pack adds a full location with unique enemies and gear to the Veil.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Graphics: Any modern GPU
  • Sound Card: Any modern sound card.
  • Additional Notes: Any modern PC will do.
